articles.title: Bruce Willis' battle with aphasia has been 'hard' for his wife Emma Heming Willis - 9Honey Celebrity
articles.content:
Bruce Willis' declining health has been tough on his wife of 12 years, Emma Heming Willis.

articles.title: Bruce Willis' wife Emma Heming is trying to 'keep it together' for their daughters - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bruce Willis' wife is doing everything she can to make sure the actor is getting the best help possible as he battles aphasia, according to a new report.

articles.title: Razzies rescind satirical award poking fun at Bruce Willis following his health disclosure - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor was nominated eight times for the special category "Worst Performance by Bruce Willis in a 2021 Movie". His family announced earlier this week that he had been diagnosed with aphasia and was retiring.
articles.content: The Razzies on Thursday (Mar 31) rescinded the satirical award they had created poking fun at Bruce Willis for his body of work in 2021 after his family announced he was retiring from acting due to t… [+1729 chars]

articles.title: Yishun 5-cent kopi saga: Coffee shop denies patron's claim that her 'kopi-o was poured away' - AsiaOne
